title: for commercial purpose
clause_text: for commercial purpose. This area will be at the disposal of the Co-operative Housing Society of the hutment-dwellers. The corpus amount shall not be spent, but the income from the property / corpus alone shall be used by the Society for maintenance of the building and premises, and such other purposes as may be laid down by the SRA.
section: Commercial / Office / Shop / Economic Activity Free of Cost
